div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 138 Asea (mod. Manari), Arcadia, 1938 Burial: 295-280 B.C. (T) Contents: 31 AR Alexander III: 2 lifetime or early post tetradr. (Ace? 1, Amphipolis 1) 8 lifetime or early post. dr. (Asia Minor mints) Philip III: 1 dr. (Colophon) Lysimachus: 1 lifetime tetradr. (Lamp- sacus ?) Athens: 19 tetradr. Disposition: Athens BCH 1938, p. 446
